items.sentence: Tom didn't notice that Mary was looking at him.
Tom tested the bath's temperature with his toe.
Have you heard how Tom is getting on in Boston?
She's not in the habit of showing her feelings.
She's not old enough to get a driver's license.
She's not a full-time employee of this company.
When Tom explained it, everything became clear.
I don't think Tom's explanation was a good one.
I'm starting to think that this was a bad idea.
I tried to answer the question, but I couldn't.
